title: NCCSL webinar on EU GSP+ on Thursday
body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka in association with the Department of Commerce of Sri Lanka will be organising a webinar on “EU GSP+ Past, Present, and Future” on Thursday 7 April from 2.30 p.m. onwards.

Department of Commerce’s Somasena Mahadiulwewa and Shirani Ariyarathna will be the resource persons at the webinar which will be useful for Directors, CEOs, Supervisors, Managers, and those who are interested and involved in imports, exports, trade, and investments.
For Registration visit https://forms.gle/pi1KXKobsRmsEcpK8 or contact Dilrukshi on 011 4741 788 or 076 2 555 707 or email: nishanthi@nationalchamber.lk.
